Reviews.Content: chosen airport hotel leave hong kong day despite convenient location hotel talk service ok outstanding deluxe look wonder standard looks hear neighbor using shower toilet nice hotel directly connected terminal 1 takes 5 minutes walk hotel terminal poor priceperformance ratio

Reviews.Title: “Could not fault it - absolutely brilliant!!!”
Reviews.Author: Danniboii100
Reviews.Content: virgin atlantic flight england broke runway checked regal airport hotel drop bags 3 free dinner buffet vouchers nice check smooth immediately buffet hungry seated enjoy meal selection didnt chance round chocolate fountain marshmellows children absolutely loved wide range cusine favourite chicken rare chicken taste nice chicken checked complex singing entertainment nice little shop bought souvenirs home decided impressed stomachs bursting disappoint spanking clean wrong airport quiet beds comfy lots hotels stayed wake call 5am inconvienient time flight leaving kids werent pleased fell asleep straight didnt leave brilliant hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”

Reviews.Content: spent week reunion ex hkg airport managers association stayed executive floor thoroughly spoiled attentive staff club lounge else perfect wonder voted bast airport hotel world thanks albert angie

Reviews.Title: “Recommend for stop over night as in airport and can take luggage up”

Reviews.Content: family 2 adults 2 kids stopped hong kong regal hotel coming europe enjoyed airport luggage airport trolley upto door hotel concierge transferred 1 little bit sleep ok liked eat airport terminal food courts 5 min walk hotel hear airplanes

Reviews.Content: am regular visitor hkg airport executive floor struggle hotel value hkg dont airport train 24 minutes central runs 12 mins day returns staff staying town base yourself airport town half hour

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad place to be stuck”
Reviews.Author: katiekins570
Reviews.Content: airline flight delayed day pretty cranky situation hotel bad stranded plus comfortable little patio nice view pool pool nice stranded luggage swimsuit extremely accessible airport convenient buffet restaurant surprisingly specializing seafood smoked salmon sashimi chocolate fondue fountain highlights downsides business center expensive frustrating touch people changed travel plans walls thin meaning starting 5am kept waking hearing people showering

Reviews.Content: period time hotel contracted company dealings hong kong stay thank god contract terminated basic cheap premium property walls paper thin 18 times stayed heard sorts conversations bodily functions ahem activities adjacent expect airport hotel soundproofing unless outside facing insulated aircraft noise note woken 5 minutes plane taking note hkg 24 hour airport noise night expect sleep shopping food near airport terminal average stay airport connecting flight suggest nearby marriott novotel century city terminal shop eat access entertainment beyond dubious pleasure forced endure sounds doors 4am

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Experience”
Reviews.Author: dga1775
Reviews.Content: hotel meticulously clean amenities ie spa facility swimming pool free transportation regal hotels located kowloon causeway bay honk kong regal club floors excellent regal club lounge 630 am 1130 pm staffed free internet access direct access airport outside airport express train goes kowloon hong kong located terminal 2 directly connected hotel steak house japanese chinese restaurants coffee shop casual dining lobby lounge excellent property highly recommend using regal airport hotel

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”

Reviews.Content: husband spent 2 days hk bali waited till minute book cuz choices city finally husband booked regal airport recomendation friend worried location boring expected super tiny reputation hk perfect hotel actually adjacent airport metro trains wich central kowloon asia world expo easily commuted didnt worry getting airport morning flight 12th floor clean comfortable spacious slept heard planes

Reviews.Title: “Stay away from the club floors”
Reviews.Author: Airbusflyer09
Reviews.Content: stay hotel it’s standard company accommodation dont advantage doubt close airport choice tired bed fast flight book “club” floors poor condition toilets don’t smell bad bathroom poor condition annoying elevator club floors key access club floor level system time renovated it’s worth accept internet access slow expensive 120 hkd 24 hours hotel looks little outdated recommend hotel hotels closeby marriot citygate hotel

Reviews.Title: “Much too expensive”

Reviews.Content: due wifes chinese visa stuck hong kong extra night centre travel morning decided try airport hotel expensive ran us200 reasonable werent facilities honestly couldnt afforded thankfully lunch buffet reasonable priced stocked curry

Reviews.Title: “Hong Kong's most convenient airport hotel”
